# log(epsilon:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an element-wise log operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func log(epsilon: Float = .ulpOfOne.squareRoot()) -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<T>
```

## Parameters

- **epsilon**: The epsilon value.

## Discussion

This function calculates `log(self+epsilon)`.
title: log(epsilon:)
